# Apple

The Apple third party provider can be customized using the following config:

```tsx
import supertokens from "supertokens-node";
import ThirdParty from "supertokens-node/recipe/thirdparty";

supertokens.init({
    supertokens: {...},
    appInfo: {
        apiDomain: "...",
        appName: "...",
        websiteDomain: "..."
    },
    recipeList: [
        ThirdParty.init({
            signInAndUpFeature: {
                //highlight-start
                providers: [
                    ThirdParty.Apple({
                        clientId: "APPLE_CLIENT_ID",
                        clientSecret: {
                            keyId: "APPLE_KEY_ID",
                            privateKey: "APPLE_PRIVATE_KEY",
                            teamId: "APPLE_TEAM_ID"
                        },
                        scope: [
                            "additionalScope",
                        ]
                    })
                ]
                //highlight-end
            }
        })
    ]
});
```

## Parameters

- `clientSecret`
  - type: `Object`
  - It is a secret that contains a keyId, privateKey and teamId used for authorisation in server-side operations.

- `clientId`
  - type: `String`
  - It is the public identifier for the app.

- `scope`
  - type: `String[]`
  - It is a string array which defines your applications access to a users account, by default users email is accessed. Additional features can be found [here](https://developer.apple.com/documentation/sign_in_with_apple/clientconfigi/3230955-scope)
